ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request: `now whoami`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Simple but effective command to know which account you are in. ```sh $ now whoami > renatorib ``` (I don't know how Teams works, but perhaps it can help with Teams too)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix `useCurrentTeam` logic NOTE: This option is not used anywhere as of right now

COMMIT.MESSAGE: add `now whoami` subcommand Not logged in: ``` $ now whoami > Not currently logged in! Please run `now --login`. ``` Logged in, stdout is a TTY: ``` $ now whoami > tootallnate $ now switch zeit $ now whoami > zeit ``` Stdout is NOT a TTY: ``` $ echo "Logged in to Now as $(now whoami)" Logged in to Now as tootallnate ``` Closes #585.
